subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Paula Creamer and Angela Park shot five-under 67s to share the first-round lead at the Samsung World Championship in Palm Desert, Calif. Michelle Wie was last in the field of 20 after a 79.
snippet: Paula Creamer and Angela Park shot five-under 67s to share the first-round lead at the Samsung World Championship in Palm Desert, Calif. Michelle Wie was last in the field of 20 after a 79.
